name: Path of the Ninja (albator2018)
description:
This is SMB 1 Level 1 like Game (Super Mario Bros 1:1)

Use the Arrow Buttons and Shift to run

  • x : slash
  • spacebar : throw shuriken

This game was made for fun and for educational purposes you can find the source code by following the link bellow https://github.com/albator2018/ninja
